Title: SOLIDCP
Description: SolidCP formerly known as WebsitePanel is Another option for hosting providers, it's an open-source control panel for hosting companies.
HomeWiki:
SolidCP is launched in 2016 as a new fork of WebsitePanel. Our aim is to create a controlpanel who is running stable (solid) and to combine windows and linux servers in one controlpanel. The linux part will be on our roadmap, which will be published soon.

Our first goal was to release a version which is running bug free, because sadly enough this was in many cases not the case with Websitepanel.

SolidCP is a joint effort from Marco Tiggelaar and Michel Jansen. If you would like to contribute to SolidCP, please contact us.

 SolidCP formerly known as WebsitePanel is Another option for hosting providers, it's an open-source control panel for hosting companies. With the help of Developers around the world investing in the future and success of SolidCP by contributing support for ongoing development efforts.  

SolidCP is a complete management portal for Cloud Computing Companies and IT Providers to automate the provisioning of a full suite of Multi-Tenant services on servers. The powerful, flexible and fully open source SolidCP platform gives users simple point-and-click control over Server applications including IIS 8.5, SQL Server 2014, MySQL 5, Exchange 2013, Sharepoint 2013, Lync 2013, Webdav, Microsoft RemoteApp and Hyper Deployments.

 

ALL Development Forks and Additional information on the SolidCP project is available here: SolidCP

The SolidCP Website is available here: SolidCP
